summary: TOOK MY 2009 DODGE CALIBER IN FOR INSPECTION.  FRONT SUB-FRAME / CROSS MEMBER IS ROTTING AWAY AND ALMOST RUSTED.  REST OF THE CAR HAS VERY LITTLE RUST.  CALLED CHRYSLER CUSTOMER CARE.  DODGE IS AWARE OF THE PROBLEM AND EXTENDED THE WARRANTY FOR THE 07 BUT NOT THE 09 KNOWING THE ISSUE WAS NOT RESOLVED.  HAVE AN APPOINTMENT AT THE DEALERSHIP (WHO ARE AWESOME) TO INSPECT THE PROBLEM FURTHER.
